- Adoption Licensing: 38-50% of total revenue (key differentiator)
- Kit Sales: 29-35% of total revenue (stable across scenarios)
- Staff Costs: 35-45% of total costs (largest component)
- Facility Costs: Varies dramatically by CAPEX scenario
- Student count variation: Major driver of profitability
- Adoption model success: Determines overall viability
